mapper.select: SELECT ssm.seller_id, ssm.shipping_method_id, sm.carrier_id, sm.name AS shipping_method_name, sm.cost, ssm.cost_override, ssm.is_default FROM seller_shipping_methods ssm JOIN shipping_methods sm ON sm.id = ssm.shipping_method_id WHERE ssm.seller_id = #{sellerId} ORDER BY ssm.is_default, sm.name
